thread.title: Joaquin Phoenix and Gus Van Sant premiere cartoonist biopic in Berlin

title: Joaquin Phoenix and Gus Van Sant premiere cartoonist biopic in Berlin
text:
Joaquin Phoenix and Gus Van Sant premiere cartoonist biopic in Berlin 1:55pm GMT - 01:33 
The duo's biopic, ''Don't Worry, He Won't Get Far on Foot,'' is competing for the Golden Bear at the Berlin Film Festival. Rough cut (no reporter narration) ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The duo's biopic, "Don't Worry, He Won't Get Far on Foot," is competing for the Golden Bear at the Berlin Film Festival. Rough cut (no reporter narration) Press CTRL+C (Windows), CMD+C (Mac), or long-press the URL below on your mobile device to copy the code https://reut.rs/2sGtdHX
